attributes.action: Make it law so that addresses, towns, and or cities of Sex Offenders are released to the public
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I think this petition falls under the Freedom of Information Act. 

Sex Offenders that have been in Prison and who are on the Sex offender register should have the locations of where they live made available to the general public.

People have a right to know who they are living near; the law should be changed to reflect this.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
